name: Fashion Hair Salon - Braid Hairstyle & Makeover
name_original: Fashion Hair Salon - Braid Hairstyle & Makeover
description:
Welcome to Crazy Hair Braid Salon! Are you ready for some crazy hair styles?

Run your own salon and show your crazy hair braids talent that is hot in fashion these days. Make various perfect braided hairstyles for long hair and use great crazy hair accessories. WOW! Crazy Hair Braid Salon is especially designed for girls and kids who like braided hair and is perfect to play for all family.

In this spa salon game, you can make Hair braid of different kinds for different occasions like a party, a club, a prom, a birthday, a wedding anniversary or any other special occasion. More make up Braiding Hairstyles and other casual hairstyles will be added in soon.

Game Play:
-----------------
• Choose your favorite Braid Hairstyle for dress up.
• Divide Long Hair into parts according to braiding style.
• Brush the long hair and make pony tails.
• Apply hair pins on hair for hair dress up.
• Apply the Braid Hairstyle.
• Spray the braided long hair.
• Check the braided hair style in mirror.

Features:
--------------
• Easy click & drag hair salon game play.
• Content suitable for all age groups.
• Cool Music and HD Graphics.
• Easy one click sharing with friends and family on Facebook.
